scripts.test: nodemon --exec 'npm run clean && npm run build && npm run lint && node dist/index.js' --watch src -e ts,ejs
scripts.build: tsc && cp -r views dist/views && cp -r public dist/public && cp -r .env dist/.env && mv dist/src/* dist/ && rm -rf dist/src
scripts.build:win: tsc && echo d | xcopy /d /s /e views dist\views && echo d |xcopy /d /s /e public dist\public && echo f | xcopy /f .env dist\.env && xcopy /s /i dist\src\* dist\ && rmdir /s /q dist\src
